posts.description: Justin Palmer on Twitter: "Why does TweetBot use Favstar for favs and retweets?  Is this a long troll?  Come on, now.  Stop it. http://t.co/rw6zLfKjPx"
posts.extended: Why does TweetBot use Favstar for favs and retweets?  Is this a long troll?  Come on, now.  Stop it.
RT @EricMarkowitz: By me: If a police officer turns his/her body camera off, should that be considered a destruction of evidence?

posts.description:
SaraWachterBoettcher on Twitter: "Ok so like: 
- Sell http://t.co/NUK14NvNXO memberships. 
- Every member gets an iron-on patch 
- Spend $ on community legal advice retainer"
posts.extended: Think Sara's on to something here.
